name: loc8abite
description: Gioco educativo per indovinare cibi e luoghi

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd loc8abite-loc8abite-nicko/loc8abite-backend && npm install && cd ../loc8abite-frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd loc8abite-loc8abite-nicko/loc8abite-frontend && npm run build && cd ../loc8abite-backend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd loc8abite-loc8abite-nicko/loc8abite-backend && npm run dev" "cd loc8abite-loc8abite-nicko/loc8abite-frontend && npm run dev"
